heading: UNefi wenza amaqoqo amabili emibhalo—Ngalinye libizwa ngokuthi yizingcwephe zikaNefi—Izingcwephe ezinkulu ziqukethe umlando wezwe; ezincane zona ziphathelene ikakhulukazi nezinto ezingcwele. Cishe ngonyaka wama 600 kuya kowama 592 ngaphambi kokuzalwa kukaKristu.

verses.txt: Futhi zonke lezi zinto ubaba wazibona, futhi wazizwa, futhi wazikhuluma, ngesikhathi ehlezi etendeni, esigodini sikaLemuweli, futhi ngokunjalo nezinye izinto eziningi kakhulu, ezingenakubhalwa kulezi zingcwephe.

Manje, njengoba sengikhulumile maqondana nalezi zingcwephe, bheka akusizona izingcwephe engibhale kuzona indaba egcwele ngomlando wabantu bami; ngokuba izingcwephe engibhale kuzo ngendaba egcwele yabantu bami zona ngizinike igama likaNefi; ngalokho-ke, zibizwa ngokuthi yizingcwephe zikaNefi, ngegama lami; futhi lezi zingcwephe nazo zibizwa ngokuthi yizingcwephe zikaNefi.
Nokho, ngithole umyalelo eNkosini wokuthi kufanele ngizenze lezi zingcwephe, ngizenzele isizathu esibalulekile ukuze kube khona indaba eqoshiwe ngobufundisi babantu bami.

Kwezinye izingcwephe kufanele kuqoshwe indaba ngokubusa kwamakhosi, kanye nezimpi nemibango yabantu bami; ngalokho-ke lezi zingcwephe ziphathelene nenxenye enkulu yobufundisi; futhi ezinye izingcwephe ziphathelene nenxenye enkulu yokubusa kwamakhosi kanye nezimpi kanye nemibango yabantu bami.
Ngalokho-ke, iNkosi ingiyalile ukuthi ngenze lezi zingcwephe ngokwe nhloso yayo enokuhlakanipha, inhloso leyo engingayazi.

Kepha iNkosi yazi izinto zonke kusukela ekuqaleni; ngalokho-ke, ilungisa indlela ukuze kufezeke yonke imisebenzi yayo phakathi kwabantwana babantu; ngokuba bheka, inawo wonke amandla ngokwanele ukuba igcwalise wonke amazwi ayo. Futhi kunjalo-nje. Amen.
